body.p:
To his Excellency
Thomas E. Bramlette

L. T. Eastham & J F McGiven of the Town of Danville has been fined each $200 for permiting gameing in their house -- now we the undersigned ask & invoke your excellency to remit the two fines above mentioned -- They are both good & true Loyal men -- both are now out of business.. each one has a family & are both Verry poor -- one of them has determined to enter the union army

L. T. Eastham
S. F. Maguire
G P Young
M I Dunham
Fon T Fox
Ben Bell
I am opinion the above cases are fit subject for Executive Clemency
Personally appeared before me the undersigned this day L. T. Eastham & J. F. McGuire & states on oath that the statements made in the within Petition are true this the 10th day of August 1864

Boyle Cir Ct
vs
J. F. McGuire
$200
Remit & send to care of T P Young & L. T. Eastham
$200.
Gaming
10th Sept/64
